name: cakewalk (ohsqueezy)
description:
cakewalk is a single button action game where you are a cake and you have to walk from one end of the line to the other without getting run over

features
  • nine levels of increasing difficulty
  • four types of enemy: slicing, revolving, burning and shooting
  • treacherous line but pleasant atmosphere
  • high scores list

You can do it if you try your best

 design and code by diskmem and music and art by azuria sky
